izzy.classification.performance_report¶

izzy.classification.performance_report(y_true, y_prob, degrees_of_freedom=None, threshold=0.5, sample_weights=None)[source]¶

A performance report for a model.

Parameters

  • y_true (ArrayLike) – True outcomes

  • y_prob (ArrayLike) – Probabilistic outcomes

  • degrees_of_freedom (float) – (Optional) The number degrees of freedom

  • threshold (float) – The cutoff to indicate successful outcomes or not (Default: 0.5)

  • sample_weights (ArrayLike) – Weight of observations

Returns

performance report

Return type

pandas.Series

izzy.classification.ks

Next topic
